dataObjects.bibliographicCitation: Moelants, T. 2010. Barbus janssensi. In: IUCN 2014 . IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2014.1 . <www.iucnredlist.org>
dataObjects.description: Barbus janssensi is known from the Tungwe River (Kanonga) and Kalule River (Bowa), both effluents of the Lualaba River, from the Kafwe River (Kanakakazi), affluent of the Lufira River and from the Lubidi River (Kafupu), all in the upper Congo River system.

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: Africa:  upper Lualaba and Lufira systems (upper Congo River basin) in Democratic Republic of the Congo (Ref. 2970).
